list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a straight line from the center to the circumference of a circle or sphere.
the thicker and shorter of the two bones in the human forearm.
(in an echinoderm or coelenterate) any of the primary axes of radial symmetry.
give a rounded form to (a corner or edge).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: Brian carefully radiused all the sharp edges and corners
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Brian cẩn thận phóng xạ tất cả các cạnh và góc sắc nét
